title: First US troops have started leaving Afghanistan as Biden decides not to extend withdrawal deadline
content:
1. First US troops have started leaving Afghanistan as Biden decides not to extend withdrawal deadline  CNN
  2. Biden won't extend Afghanistan deadline as Taliban reiterates demand for US forces to leave  Fox News
  3. US ramps up Afghanistan evacuations ahead of Aug. 31 deadline l GMA  ABC News
  4. Opinion | This Is What the Afghan Evacuation Looks Like on the Inside  The New York Times
  5. Mike Pompeo: Biden's weakness puts American lives at risk in Afghanistan. We can't leave anyone behind  Fox News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 米軍がアフガニスタンからの撤退を開始、バイデン首相が撤退期限の延長を断念
拜登决定不延长撤军期限，首批美军已开始撤离阿富汗
拜登決定不延長撤軍期限，首批美軍已開始撤離阿富汗
